name: Jelly Roger
description:
Help the pirate to find the missing ship's wheel and connect it back to the pedestal in order to continue on your adventure.

This is a physics based 2-player platformer game where you both control one character.

Controls:

Player 1:
Use 'Left' and 'Right' arrows to move, 'Up' and 'Down' arrows to climb ladders and 'Space' to jump

Player 2:
Use  the mouse in order to move the arms, use left button/right button in order to catch and hold objects

Credits:

Designers: Tig Redeye, Orian Kidron
Developers: Elior Digmi, Harel Don-Yehiya
Guidance: Dani Bacon, Itamar Ernst, Mati Ernst, Nir Lahad, Omer Zadok

Sound Effects By:

Town Market
Capering

The game was made as part of a game jam course in Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design & Hebrew University, 2022.
